00090 - (void)runTest

00094     [self performSelector:_selector];

00214         [self failNotEqual:expected actual:actual message:message];

00365 {

00367     try { zeroArgClosure(); }
00368     catch (e) { exception = e; }
00369     [self assertNull:exception message:"Caught unexpected exception " + exception];

00383 - (void)assertThrows:(Function)zeroArgClosure
00384 {
00385     var exception = nil;
00386     try { zeroArgClosure(); }
00387     catch (e) { exception = e; }
00388     [self assertNotNull:exception message:"Should have cought an exception, but got nothing"];

00400 {

00402         message:"string '" + aString + "' should be matched by regex /" + aRegex + "/"];
